items.name: Basic Supplies
items.description: A small kit of everyday travel essentials.
items.effect_text: Useful for common tasks during travel.

items.name: Trail Rations
items.description: Dry provisions for a day of travel.
items.effect_text: When you rest, clear 1 stress.

items.name: Climbing Kit
items.description: Ropes, spikes, and harness for difficult ascents.
items.effect_text: Gain +1 to rolls to scale obstacles.

items.name: Lockpicks
items.description: Fine tools for opening stubborn locks.
items.effect_text: Gain +1 to rolls to bypass locks quietly.

items.name: Arcane Focus
items.description: A charm or crystal that steadies spellwork.
items.effect_text: Once per rest, reduce a recall cost by 1.

items.name: Instrument Kit
items.description: Compact instruments suited for travel performances.
items.effect_text: Once per rest, an ally gains 1 hope after your performance.

items.name: Herbal Tonic
items.description: A brewed tonic with a bitter finish.
items.effect_text: Heal 1 HP or clear 1 stress.

items.name: Sun Charm
items.description: A warm token etched with a radiant symbol.
items.effect_text: Shed light; once per rest, reduce fear by 1.

items.name: Weapon Maintenance Kit
items.description: Oil, whetstone, and spare wraps for field repairs.
items.effect_text: Once per rest, add +1 damage to a single weapon hit.

items.name: Field Notes
items.description: A travel ledger filled with diagrams and spells.
items.effect_text: Gain +1 to recall or research rolls in the field.

items.name: Premium Bedroll
items.description: During downtime, you automatically clear a Stress.
items.effect_text: During downtime, you automatically clear a Stress.

items.name: Piper Whistle
items.description: This handcrafted whistle has a distinctive sound. When you blow this whistle, its piercing tone can be heard within a 1-mile radius.
items.effect_text: This handcrafted whistle has a distinctive sound. When you blow this whistle, its piercing tone can be heard within a 1-mile radius.

items.name: Charging Quiver
items.description: When you succeed on an attack with an arrow stored in this quiver, gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to your current tier.
items.effect_text: When you succeed on an attack with an arrow stored in this quiver, gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to your current tier.

items.name: Daybright Torch
items.description: You may light this magic torch at will.
items.effect_text: You may light this magic torch at will. The flame's light fills a much larger space than it should, enough to illuminate a cave bright as day.

items.name: Speaking Orbs
items.description: This pair of orbs allows any creatures holding them to communicate with each other across any distance.
items.effect_text: This pair of orbs allows any creatures holding them to communicate with each other across any distance.

items.name: Manacles
items.description: This pair of locking cuffs comes with a key.
items.effect_text: This pair of locking cuffs comes with a key.

items.name: Arcane Cloak
items.description: A creature with a Spellcast trait wearing this cloak can adjust its color, texture, and size at will.
items.effect_text: A creature with a Spellcast trait wearing this cloak can adjust its color, texture, and size at will.

items.name: Woven Net
items.description: You may make a Finesse Roll using this net to trap a small creature.
items.effect_text: You may make a Finesse Roll using this net to trap a small creature. A trapped target can break free with a successful Attack Roll (16).

items.name: Fire Jar
items.description: You may pour out the strange liquid contents of this jar to instantly produce fire.
items.effect_text: You may pour out the strange liquid contents of this jar to instantly produce fire. The contents regenerate when you take a long rest.

items.name: Suspended Rod
items.description: This flat rod is inscribed with runes. When you activate the rod, it is immediately suspended in place.
items.effect_text: This flat rod is inscribed with runes. When you activate the rod, it is immediately suspended in place. Until the rod is deactivated, it can't move, doesn't abide by the rules of gravity, and remains in place.

items.name: Glamour Stone
items.description: Activate this pebble-sized stone to memorize the appearance of someone you can see.
items.effect_text: Activate this pebble-sized stone to memorize the appearance of someone you can see. Spend 1 Hope to magically recreate this guise on yourself as an illusion.

items.name: Empty Chest
items.description: This magical chest appears empty. When you speak a specific trigger word or action and open the chest, you can see the items stored within it.
items.effect_text: This magical chest appears empty. When you speak a specific trigger word or action and open the chest, you can see the items stored within it.

items.name: Companion Case
items.description: This case can fit a small animal companion. While the companion is inside, the animal and case are immune to all damage and harmful effects.
items.effect_text: This case can fit a small animal companion. While the companion is inside, the animal and case are immune to all damage and harmful effects.

items.name: Piercing Arrows
items.description: Three times per rest when you succeed on an attack with one of these arrows, you can add your Proficiency to the damage roll.
items.effect_text: Three times per rest when you succeed on an attack with one of these arrows, you can add your Proficiency to the damage roll.

items.name: Valorstone
items.description: You may attach this stone to armor that doesn't already have a feature.
items.effect_text: You may attach this stone to armor that doesn't already have a feature. The armor gains the following feature. Resilient: Before you mark your last Armor Slot, roll a d6. On a result of 6, reduce the severity by one threshold without marking an Armor Slot.

items.name: Skeleton Key
items.description: When you use this key to open a locked door, you gain advantage on the Finesse Roll.
items.effect_text: When you use this key to open a locked door, you gain advantage on the Finesse Roll.

items.name: Arcane Prism
items.description: Position this prism in a location of your choosing and activate it.
items.effect_text: Position this prism in a location of your choosing and activate it. All allies within Close range of it gain a +1 bonus to their Spellcast Rolls. While activated, the prism can't be moved. Once the prism is deactivated, it can't be activated again until your next long rest.

items.name: Minor Stamina Potion Recipe
items.description: As a downtime move, you can use the bone of a creature to craft a Minor Stamina Potion.
items.effect_text: As a downtime move, you can use the bone of a creature to craft a Minor Stamina Potion.

items.name: Minor Health Potion Recipe
items.description: As a downtime move, you can use a vial of blood to craft a Minor Health Potion.
items.effect_text: As a downtime move, you can use a vial of blood to craft a Minor Health Potion.

items.name: Homing Compasses
items.description: These two compasses point toward each other no matter how far apart they are.
items.effect_text: These two compasses point toward each other no matter how far apart they are.

items.name: Corrector Sprite
items.description: This tiny sprite sits in the curve of your ear canal and whispers helpful advice during combat.
items.effect_text: This tiny sprite sits in the curve of your ear canal and whispers helpful advice during combat. Once per short rest, you can gain advantage on an attack roll.

items.name: Gecko Gloves
items.description: You may climb up vertical surfaces and across ceilings.
items.effect_text: You may climb up vertical surfaces and across ceilings.

items.name: Lorekeeper
items.description: You may store the name and details of up to three hostile creatures inside this book. You gain a +1 bonus to action rolls against those creatures.
items.effect_text: You may store the name and details of up to three hostile creatures inside this book. You gain a +1 bonus to action rolls against those creatures.

items.name: Smokeguard Vial Recipe
items.description: As a downtime move, you can mark a Stress to craft a Smokeguard Vial.
items.effect_text: As a downtime move, you can mark a Stress to craft a Smokeguard Vial.

items.name: Bloodstone
items.description: You may attach this stone to a weapon that doesn't already have a feature.
items.effect_text: You may attach this stone to a weapon that doesn't already have a feature. The weapon gains the following feature. Brutal: When you roll the maximum value on a damage die, roll an additional damage die.

items.name: Greatstone
items.description: You may attach this stone to a weapon that doesn't already have a feature.
items.effect_text: You may attach this stone to a weapon that doesn't already have a feature. The weapon gains the following feature. Powerful: On a successful attack, roll an additional damage die and discard the lowest result.

items.name: Glider
items.description: While falling, you can mark a Stress to deploy this small parachute and glide safely to the ground.
items.effect_text: While falling, you can mark a Stress to deploy this small parachute and glide safely to the ground.

items.name: Ring of Silence
items.description: Spend 1 Hope to activate this ring. Your footsteps are silent until your next rest.
items.effect_text: Spend 1 Hope to activate this ring. Your footsteps are silent until your next rest.

items.name: Calming Pendant
items.description: When you would mark your last Stress, roll a d6.
items.effect_text: When you would mark your last Stress, roll a d6. On a result of 5 or higher, don't mark it.

items.name: Dual Flask
items.description: This flask can hold two different liquids. You may swap between them by flipping a small switch on the flask's side.
items.effect_text: This flask can hold two different liquids. You may swap between them by flipping a small switch on the flask's side.

items.name: Shifting Sand Pouch
items.description: You may convince this small bag of sand to be much heavier or lighter with a successful Presence Roll (10).
items.effect_text: You may convince this small bag of sand to be much heavier or lighter with a successful Presence Roll (10). Additionally, on a successful Finesse Roll (10), you can blow a bit of sand into a target's face to make them temporarily Vulnerable.

items.name: Ring of Resistance
items.description: Once per long rest, you can activate this ring after a successful attack against you to halve the damage.
items.effect_text: Once per long rest, you can activate this ring after a successful attack against you to halve the damage.

items.name: Phoenix Feather
items.description: If you have at least one Phoenix Feather on you when you fall unconscious, you gain a +1 bonus to the roll you make to determine whether you gain a scar.
items.effect_text: If you have at least one Phoenix Feather on you when you fall unconscious, you gain a +1 bonus to the roll you make to determine whether you gain a scar.

items.name: Lucky Goods Box
items.description: Once per long rest, you can open this small box and roll a d12.
items.effect_text: Once per long rest, you can open this small box and roll a d12. On a result of 1-6, it's empty. On a result of 7-10, it contains one random common consumable. On a result of 11-12, it contains two random common consumables.

items.name: Airblade Charm
items.description: You may attach this charm to a weapon with a Melee range.
items.effect_text: You may attach this charm to a weapon with a Melee range. Three times per rest, you can activate the charm and attack a target within Close range.

items.name: Portal Seed
items.description: You may plant this seed in the ground to grow a portal in that spot.
items.effect_text: You may plant this seed in the ground to grow a portal in that spot. The portal is readyto use in 24 hours. You may use this portal to travel to any other location where you planted a portal seed. A portal can be destroyed by dealing any amount of magic damage to it.

items.name: Oathbound Chain
items.description: As a downtime move, you can meditate on an ideal or principle you hold dear and focus your will into this chain.
items.effect_text: As a downtime move, you can meditate on an ideal or principle you hold dear and focus your will into this chain. Once per long rest, you can spend 1 Hope to roll a d20 as your Hope Die for rolls that directly align with that principle.

items.name: Elusive Amulet
items.description: Once per long rest, you can activate this amulet to become Hidden until you move. While Hidden in this way, you remain unseen even if an adversary moves to where they would normally see you.
items.effect_text: Once per long rest, you can activate this amulet to become Hidden until you move. While Hidden in this way, you remain unseen even if an adversary moves to where they would normally see you.

items.name: Hopekeeper Locket
items.description: During a long rest, if you have 6 Hope, you can spend 1 Hope to imbue this locket with your bountiful resolve.
items.effect_text: During a long rest, if you have 6 Hope, you can spend 1 Hope to imbue this locket with your bountiful resolve. When you have 0 Hope, you can use the locket to immediately gain a Hope. The locket must be re-imbued before it can be used this way again.

items.name: Infinite Bag
items.description: When you store items in this bag, they are kept in a pocket dimension that never runs out of space. You may retrieve an item at any time.
items.effect_text: When you store items in this bag, they are kept in a pocket dimension that never runs out of space. You may retrieve an item at any time.

items.name: Stride Relic
items.description: You gain a +1 bonus to your Agility. You may only carry one relic.
items.effect_text: You gain a +1 bonus to your Agility. You may only carry one relic.

items.name: Bolster Relic
items.description: You gain a +1 bonus to your Strength. You may only carry one relic.
items.effect_text: You gain a +1 bonus to your Strength. You may only carry one relic.

items.name: Control Relic
items.description: You gain a +1 bonus to your Finesse. You may only carry one relic.
items.effect_text: You gain a +1 bonus to your Finesse. You may only carry one relic.

items.name: Attune Relic
items.description: You gain a +1 bonus to your Instinct. You may only carry one relic.
items.effect_text: You gain a +1 bonus to your Instinct. You may only carry one relic.

items.name: Charm Relic
items.description: You gain a +1 bonus to your Presence. You may only carry one relic.
items.effect_text: You gain a +1 bonus to your Presence. You may only carry one relic.

items.name: Enlighten Relic
items.description: You gain a +1 bonus to your Knowledge. You may only carry one relic.
items.effect_text: You gain a +1 bonus to your Knowledge. You may only carry one relic.

items.name: Honing Relic
items.description: You gain a +1 bonus to an Experience of your choice. You may only carry one relic.
items.effect_text: You gain a +1 bonus to an Experience of your choice. You may only carry one relic.

items.name: Glimmermoth Pendant
items.description: While you carry this pendant, your weapons with a Melee range that deal physical damage have a gossamer sheen and can attack targets within Very Close range.
items.effect_text: While you carry this pendant, your weapons with a Melee range that deal physical damage have a gossamer sheen and can attack targets within Very Close range.

items.name: Waterstride Boots
items.description: You may walk on the surface of water as if it were soft ground.
items.effect_text: You may walk on the surface of water as if it were soft ground.

items.name: Clay Companion
items.description: When you sculpt this ball of clay into a clay animal companion, it behaves as that animal.
items.effect_text: When you sculpt this ball of clay into a clay animal companion, it behaves as that animal. For example, a clay spider can spin clay webs, while a clay bird can fly. The clay companion retains memory and identity across different shapes, but they can adopt new mannerisms with each form.

items.name: Mythic Dust Recipe
items.description: As a downtime move, you can use a handful of fine gold dust to craft Mythic Dust.
items.effect_text: As a downtime move, you can use a handful of fine gold dust to craft Mythic Dust.

items.name: Shard of Memory
items.description: Once per long rest, you can spend 2 Hope to recall a domain card from your vault instead of paying its Recall Cost.
items.effect_text: Once per long rest, you can spend 2 Hope to recall a domain card from your vault instead of paying its Recall Cost.

items.name: Gem of Agility
items.description: You may attach this gem to a weapon, allowing you to use your Agility when making an attack with that weapon.
items.effect_text: You may attach this gem to a weapon, allowing you to use your Agility when making an attack with that weapon.

items.name: Gem of Strength
items.description: You may attach this gem to a weapon, allowing you to use your Strength when making an attack with that weapon.
items.effect_text: You may attach this gem to a weapon, allowing you to use your Strength when making an attack with that weapon.

items.name: Gem of Finesse
items.description: You may attach this gem to a weapon, allowing you to use your Finesse when making an attack with that weapon.
items.effect_text: You may attach this gem to a weapon, allowing you to use your Finesse when making an attack with that weapon.

items.name: Gem of Instinct
items.description: You may attach this gem to a weapon, allowing you to use your Instinct when making an attack with that weapon.
items.effect_text: You may attach this gem to a weapon, allowing you to use your Instinct when making an attack with that weapon.

items.name: Gem of Presence
items.description: You may attach this gem to a weapon, allowing you to use your Presence when making an attack with that weapon.
items.effect_text: You may attach this gem to a weapon, allowing you to use your Presence when making an attack with that weapon.

items.name: Gem of Knowledge
items.description: You may attach this gem to a weapon, allowing you to use your Knowledge when making an attack with that weapon.
items.effect_text: You may attach this gem to a weapon, allowing you to use your Knowledge when making an attack with that weapon.

items.name: Fearward Ring
items.description: Once per session, when the GM spends a Fear, you can spend 4 Hope to cancel the effects of that spent Fear.
items.effect_text: Once per session, when the GM spends a Fear, you can spend 4 Hope to cancel the effects of that spent Fear.

items.name: Belt of Unity
items.description: Once per session, you can spend 5 Hope to lead a Tag Team Roll with three PCs instead of two.
items.effect_text: Once per session, you can spend 5 Hope to lead a Tag Team Roll with three PCs instead of two.

items.name: Stride Potion
items.description: You gain a +1 bonus to your next Agility Roll.
items.effect_text: You gain a +1 bonus to your next Agility Roll.

items.name: Bolster Potion
items.description: You gain a +1 bonus to your next Strength Roll.
items.effect_text: You gain a +1 bonus to your next Strength Roll.

items.name: Control Potion
items.description: You gain a +1 bonus to your next Finesse Roll.
items.effect_text: You gain a +1 bonus to your next Finesse Roll.

items.name: Attune Potion
items.description: You gain a +1 bonus to your next Instinct Roll.
items.effect_text: You gain a +1 bonus to your next Instinct Roll.

items.name: Charm Potion
items.description: You gain a +1 bonus to your next Presence Roll.
items.effect_text: You gain a +1 bonus to your next Presence Roll.

items.name: Enlighten Potion
items.description: You gain a +1 bonus to your next Knowledge Roll.
items.effect_text: You gain a +1 bonus to your next Knowledge Roll.

items.name: Minor Health Potion
items.description: Clear 1d4 HP.
items.effect_text: Clear 1d4 HP.

items.name: Minor Stamina Potion
items.description: Clear 1d4 Stress.
items.effect_text: Clear 1d4 Stress.

items.name: Wyvern Venom
items.description: You may apply this venom to a weapon that deals physical damage to add a d6 to your next damage roll with that weapon.
items.effect_text: You may apply this venom to a weapon that deals physical damage to add a d6 to your next damage roll with that weapon.

items.name: Hopeleaf
items.description: You may eat these paired leaves to immediately gain 2 Hope.
items.effect_text: You may eat these paired leaves to immediately gain 2 Hope.

items.name: Nightvision Vial
items.description: When you drink the contents of this vial, you can see in total darkness until your next rest.
items.effect_text: When you drink the contents of this vial, you can see in total darkness until your next rest.

items.name: Unstable Arcane Shard
items.description: You may make a Finesse Roll to throw this shard at a group of adversaries within Far range.
items.effect_text: You may make a Finesse Roll to throw this shard at a group of adversaries within Far range. Targets you succeed against take 1d20 magic damage.

items.name: Potion of Stability
items.description: You may drink this potion to choose one additional downtime move.
items.effect_text: You may drink this potion to choose one additional downtime move.

items.name: Improved Wyvern Venom
items.description: You may apply this venom to a weapon that deals physical damage to add a d8 to your next damage roll with that weapon.
items.effect_text: You may apply this venom to a weapon that deals physical damage to add a d8 to your next damage roll with that weapon.

items.name: Morphing Clay
items.description: You may spend 1 Hope to use this clay, altering your face enough to make you unrecognizable until your next rest.
items.effect_text: You may spend 1 Hope to use this clay, altering your face enough to make you unrecognizable until your next rest.

items.name: Smokeguard Vial
items.description: When an adversary attacks you, use this vial and roll a number of d6s equal to your Agility.
items.effect_text: When an adversary attacks you, use this vial and roll a number of d6s equal to your Agility. Add the highest result to your Evasion against the attack.

items.name: Jumping Root
items.description: Eat this root to leap up to Far range once without needing to roll.
items.effect_text: Eat this root to leap up to Far range once without needing to roll.

items.name: Snap Powder
items.description: Mark a Stress and clear a HP.
items.effect_text: Mark a Stress and clear a HP.

items.name: Health Potion
items.description: Clear 1d4+1 HP.
items.effect_text: Clear 1d4+1 HP.

items.name: Stamina Potion
items.description: Clear 1d4+1 Stress.
items.effect_text: Clear 1d4+1 Stress.

items.name: Armor Stitcher
items.description: You may use this stitcherto spend any number of Hope and clearthat many Armor Slots.
items.effect_text: You may use this stitcherto spend any number of Hope and clearthat many Armor Slots.

items.name: Gill Salve
items.description: You may apply this salve to your neck to breathe underwater for a number of minutes equal to your level.
items.effect_text: You may apply this salve to your neck to breathe underwater for a number of minutes equal to your level.

items.name: Replication Parchment
items.description: By touching this piece of parchment to another, you can perfectly copy the second parchment's contents.
items.effect_text: By touching this piece of parchment to another, you can perfectly copy the second parchment's contents. Once used, this parchment becomes mundane paper.

items.name: Improved Arcane Shard
items.description: You may make a Finesse Roll to throw this shard at a group of adversaries within Far range.
items.effect_text: You may make a Finesse Roll to throw this shard at a group of adversaries within Far range. Targets you succeed against take 2d20 magic damage.

items.name: Major Stride Potion
items.description: You gain a +1 bonus to your Agility until your next rest.
items.effect_text: You gain a +1 bonus to your Agility until your next rest.

items.name: Major Bolster Potion
items.description: You gain a +1 bonus to your Strength until your next rest.
items.effect_text: You gain a +1 bonus to your Strength until your next rest.

items.name: Major Control Potion
items.description: You gain a +1 bonus to your Finesse until your next rest.
items.effect_text: You gain a +1 bonus to your Finesse until your next rest.

items.name: Major Attune Potion
items.description: You gain a +1 bonus to your Instinct until your next rest.
items.effect_text: You gain a +1 bonus to your Instinct until your next rest.

items.name: Major Charm Potion
items.description: You gain a +1 bonus to your Presence until your next rest.
items.effect_text: You gain a +1 bonus to your Presence until your next rest.

items.name: Major Enlighten Potion
items.description: You gain a +1 bonus to your Knowledge until your next rest.
items.effect_text: You gain a +1 bonus to your Knowledge until your next rest.

items.name: Blood of the Phase Spider
items.description: You may drink this blood to disappear from where you are and immediately reappear at a point you can see within Very Far range.
items.effect_text: You may drink this blood to disappear from where you are and immediately reappear at a point you can see within Very Far range.

items.name: Surestrike Potion
items.description: After drinking this potion, the next successful attack you make critically succeeds.
items.effect_text: After drinking this potion, the next successful attack you make critically succeeds.

items.name: Manticore Saliva
items.description: You may apply this saliva to a weapon that deals physical damage to add a d12 to your next damage roll with that weapon.
items.effect_text: You may apply this saliva to a weapon that deals physical damage to add a d12 to your next damage roll with that weapon.

items.name: Channelstone
items.description: You may use this stone to take a spell or grimoire from your vault, use it once, and return it to your vault.
items.effect_text: You may use this stone to take a spell or grimoire from your vault, use it once, and return it to your vault.

items.name: Mythic Dust
items.description: You may apply this dust to a weapon that deals magic damage to add a d12 to your next damage roll with that weapon.
items.effect_text: You may apply this dust to a weapon that deals magic damage to add a d12 to your next damage roll with that weapon.

items.name: Acidpaste
items.description: This paste eats awaywalls and other surfaces in bright flashes.
items.effect_text: This paste eats awaywalls and other surfaces in bright flashes.

items.name: Sanctuary Flare
items.description: When you use this flare, allies within Close range roll a d6 when they spend 1 Hope.
items.effect_text: When you use this flare, allies within Close range roll a d6 when they spend 1 Hope. On a result of 6, they gain the effect of that Hope without spending it. The flare lasts until the end of the scene.

items.name: Major Arcane Shard
items.description: You may make a Finesse Roll to throw this shard at a group of adversaries within Far range.
items.effect_text: You may make a Finesse Roll to throw this shard at a group of adversaries within Far range. Targets you succeed against take 4d20 magic damage.

items.name: Featherbone
items.description: You may use this bone to control your falling speed for a number of minutes equal to your level.
items.effect_text: You may use this bone to control your falling speed for a number of minutes equal to your level.

items.name: Circle of the Void
items.description: Mark a Stress to create a void that extends up to Far range.
items.effect_text: Mark a Stress to create a void that extends up to Far range. No magic can be cast inside the void, and creatures within the void are immune to magic damage.

items.name: Worldtree Sap
items.description: Consume this sap to roll a d6.
items.effect_text: Consume this sap to roll a d6. On a result of 5-6, clear 2 HP. On a result of 2-4, clear 3 Stress. On a result of 1, see through the veil of death and return changed, gaining one scar.

items.name: Viperfang Poison
items.description: A creature who consumes this poison takes 8d10 direct magic damage.
items.effect_text: A creature who consumes this poison takes 8d10 direct magic damage.

items.name: Major Health Potion
items.description: Clear 1d4+2 HP.
items.effect_text: Clear 1d4+2 HP.

items.name: Major Stamina Potion
items.description: Clear 1d4+2 Stress.
items.effect_text: Clear 1d4+2 Stress.

items.name: Ogre Musk
items.description: You may use this musk to prevent anyone from tracking you by mundane or magical means until your next rest.
items.effect_text: You may use this musk to prevent anyone from tracking you by mundane or magical means until your next rest.

items.name: Wingsprout
items.description: You gain magic wings that allow you to fly for a number of minutes equal to your level.
items.effect_text: You gain magic wings that allow you to fly for a number of minutes equal to your level.

items.name: Deafening Echo Jar
items.description: You may open this jar to release a deafening echo of voices for a number of minutes equal to your Instinct.
items.effect_text: You may open this jar to release a deafening echo of voices for a number of minutes equal to your Instinct. Creatures within Far range unprepared for the sound take 6d8 magic damage.

items.name: Dragonfire Tea
items.description: You may drink this tea to unleash a fiery breath attack.
items.effect_text: You may drink this tea to unleash a fiery breath attack. Make an Instinct Roll against all adversaries in front of you within Close range. Targets you succeed against take d20 physical damage using your Proficiency.

items.name: Bridge Seed
items.description: Thickvines growfrom your location to a point of your choice within Far range, allowing you to climb up or across them.
items.effect_text: Thickvines growfrom your location to a point of your choice within Far range, allowing you to climb up or across them. The vines dissipate on your next short rest.

items.name: Sleeping Sap
items.description: You may drink this potion to fall asleep for a full night's rest. You clear all Stress upon waking.
items.effect_text: You may drink this potion to fall asleep for a full night's rest. You clear all Stress upon waking.

items.name: Triumphant Feast
items.description: You may eat this meal to clear all HP and Stress and gain 1d4 Hope.
items.effect_text: You may eat this meal to clear all HP and Stress and gain 1d4 Hope.

items.name: Bonding Honey
items.description: This honey can be used to glue two objects together permanently.
items.effect_text: This honey can be used to glue two objects together permanently.

items.name: Shrinking Potion
items.description: You may drink this potion to halve your size until you choose to drop this form or your next rest. While in this form, you have a +2 bonus to Agility and a -1 penalty to your Proficiency.
items.effect_text: You may drink this potion to halve your size until you choose to drop this form or your next rest. While in this form, you have a +2 bonus to Agility and a -1 penalty to your Proficiency.

items.name: Growing Potion
items.description: You may drink this potion to double your size until you choose to drop this form or your next rest. While in this form, you have a +2 bonus to Strength and a +1 bonus to your Proficiency.
items.effect_text: You may drink this potion to double your size until you choose to drop this form or your next rest. While in this form, you have a +2 bonus to Strength and a +1 bonus to your Proficiency.

items.name: Knowledge Stone
items.description: If you die while holding this stone, an ally can take a card from your loadout to place in their loadout or vault.
items.effect_text: If you die while holding this stone, an ally can take a card from your loadout to place in their loadout or vault. After they take this knowledge, the stone crumbles.

items.name: Sweet Moss
items.description: You may consume this moss during a rest to clear 1d10 HP or 1d10 Stress.
items.effect_text: You may consume this moss during a rest to clear 1d10 HP or 1d10 Stress.

items.name: Blinding Orb
items.description: You may activate this orb to create a flash of bright light.
items.effect_text: You may activate this orb to create a flash of bright light. All targets within Close range become Vulnerable until they mark HP.

items.name: Death Tea
items.description: After you drink this tea, you instantly kill your target when you critically succeed on an attack.
items.effect_text: After you drink this tea, you instantly kill your target when you critically succeed on an attack. If you don't critically succeed on an attack before your next long rest, you die.

items.name: Aegis Mirror
items.description: When you take damage, you can spend 1 Hope to negate that damage, after which the mirror shatters.
items.effect_text: When you take damage, you can spend 1 Hope to negate that damage, after which the mirror shatters.

items.name: Stardrop
items.description: You may use this stardrop to summon a hailstorm of comets that deals 8d20 physical damage to all targets within Very Far range.
items.effect_text: You may use this stardrop to summon a hailstorm of comets that deals 8d20 physical damage to all targets within Very Far range.
